title: The Bible Series - Bible Challenge Game on DVD - VOB
description:
Bible Challenge Game on DVD - VOB


POtHS Comments on This one: I am pretty good at level one, but after that I fall apart.


Discription

Features:

* The Bible Challenge on DVD Game
* Has more than 600 Bible Challenge Questions
* Fully narrated with on screen questions and answers with Scripture passages.
* Automatic on-screen scorekeeping
* Can also be used in Bible mode, just like our KJV Bible on DVD.
* Plays on any DVD player or computer with a DVD drive

Benefits of an Audio Bible:

* The Bible Challenge is an interactive, multiple-choice game formulated to quiz your Bible Knowledge.
* The Bible Challenge Game teaches children and adults the Bible.
* This family-oriented Bible game also contains the entire dramatized narration of the KJV both Old and New Testament on two DVDs.
* The Bible on DVD helps children learn to read and understand the Bible
* The Bible on DVD gives you a choice of what to watch on television

Voice narrator/Artist:

* Dramatization read by multiple voices.
* Narrated by Stephen Johnston.
* Stephen Johnston has narrated and sold more translations of the Bible than any other person in history

Translation Information:

* King James Version
* The King James Version was originally published in 1611.
* Word for Word Translation
* Number of Translators: 54
